mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dish(name, category_id, price, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, status) VALUE (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{status})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dish WHERE id IN (#{id})
mapper.select: SELECT t1.status IS NOT NULL AND SUM(t1.status) > 0 FROM ( SELECT status FROM dish WHERE id IN(#{id})) t1
